parameters.name: CalType
parameters.description: The old or new version of the security score rule. If you set this parameter to **home_security_score**, the new version of the security score rule is changed. Otherwise, the old version of the security score rule is changed by default.

parameters.name: ResetSecurityScoreRule
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to reset to the system default rule. Valid values:

*   true: yes
*   false: no

parameters.name: SecurityScoreCategoryList
parameters.description: The information about the new version of the security score rule.

parameters.name: SecurityScoreRuleList
parameters.description: The information about the old version of the security score rule.
